GSD.product_version: versions from v3.17 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
video: fbdev: amba-clcd: Fix refcount leak bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit da276dc288bf838ea0fd778b5441ec0f601c69f7, it was introduced in version v3.17 by commit d10715be03bd8bad59ddc50236cb140c3bd73c7b. For more details please see the references link.
